title.rendered: 12 Colours Colors Air Dry Clay. Super Light DIY Clay for Model Air Dry Clay Fun Toy, Creative Art DIY Crafts, Gift for Kids ((Clay Pack of 12 Pcs)

content.rendered: Easy-to-Use Clay Air-Dries The PF Air-Dry Clay is made with natural, white earth clay that is easy to manipulate and sculpt. The smooth, pliable material is finer and less sticky than traditional clay. This air-dry clay softens easily with water, cleans up quickly from surfaces. It’s easy to use with tools like plastic forks, combs, and rolling pins. What’s in the Box : 12 pieces of Air-dry Clay with different colours. An easy-to-follow, step-by-step direction for each individual figure. Advantage: The clay air dries in just a few hours, so there’s no need for traditional ceramic firing in an oven or kiln. Finished pieces can be decorated with paint or varnish when dry, providing plenty of opportunities to foster creativity in your child. Air dries without a kiln or oven Smooth, pliable clay is less sticky than traditional clay Air-dry clay softens easily with water finished pieces can be painted or varnished Clay is more than enough for one figure.

excerpt.rendered:
Clay Multi colors a set (each color about 0.45 oz, total about 11 oz) with modelling tools.

Save and use way: This clay can’t be baked in the oven,need air dry and please sealed presevation othewise clay will dry up

Shape and once cool can be sanded, drilled, carved and finished with super modeling clay mania.

Eco-friendly material- Non-toxic,harmless to human and environment, more durable. Extremely soft and flexible and non-sticky. Does not stick to your hands. Super stretchy when it dries and hardens . Clay stays lightweight,the modeling clay takes 24 hours to fully harden

Feature:It has strong plasticity which is easy to shape.It is also very soft smooth and non-sticky,easy to handle

Set of 12 Different Colours, Fluffy Foam Clay with Tools, Pack of 12 (1 Piece Each Colour) Super Light DIY Clay for Model air Dry Clay Fun Toy, Creative Art DIY Crafts, Gift for Kids
